name: Games Writer Simulator: Wannabe Edition
description:
Games Writer Simulator: Wannabe Edition is an interactive narrative that details the journey of a budding games writer.  Expect cryptic flowers, cynical stalks of broccoli, and a whole lot of walking.  You can reach me at jpeloquin16bf@gmail.com if you’d like to complain about how much walking there is.

            Genre:  Story-Based, Walking Simulator

            Average Playtime:  Five minutes.
